metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1691 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The framework/Util/lib/Horde/Variables.php script in the Util library in Horde before 5.1.1 allows remote attackers to conduct object injection attacks and execute arbitrary PHP code via a crafted serialized object in the _formvars form.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1691` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-horde-util - 2.3.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-horde-util package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.0-1').
